document.full_text: oil plunged nearly 7 percent on thursday, heading for the biggest daily drop in dollar terms since the 2008 financial crisis, as concerns about economic growth and monetary tightening clobbered commodities.
document.title: oil plummets nearly 7 percent as commodities battered
lines_and_colors: oil plunged nearly 7 percent on thursday, heading for the biggest daily drop in dollar terms since the 2008 financial crisis, as concerns about economic growth and monetary tightening clobbered commodities.
